attributes.additional_details:
we need a real way to stop these people and this must be the only way .something they fear, not 10 years jail serve half the time.
  if we do live in a democracy then 95% of the country want the death penalty, so why then have we no death penalty.
 because we only have democracy for one day, election day, after that your views are ignored for five more years. then you are promised democacy again. if we keep on falling for this, it will not stop only keep on getting slowly worse until it is to bad to stop at all
